price: 68. Addoomahaygiiyoow! Cabsi ma aha korkiinna maanta, mana murugooneysaan.
arabic: يَٰعِبَادِ لَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ وَلَآ أَنتُمۡ تَحۡزَنُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yāʿibādi lā khawfun ʿalaykumu al-yawma walā antum taḥzanūna
